name: Midnight Snack (Nevh)
description:
MOBILE PROGRAMMING PROJECT

Take the role of a bat trying to eat insects in the air with the use of your voice! Use your voice to place the bat high to grab the insect and stay quiet to make him stay low, every time you miss the bat gets hurt up to 3 times! An endless runner with no end and try to get a higher score every time!

This was a school project learning to create mobile games using the microphone for controls. 

Requires Android 5.1 or higher and a working microphone

Developed by:
Ervite, Juan Enrico
Huet, Nicolas Eduardo
Celen, Aleck Miguel
Ausmolo, Dave Austin
